overview: Convinced that his family’s blood is tainted by generations of evil, Roderick Usher is hell-bent on destroying his sister Madeline’s wedding to prevent the cursed Usher bloodline from extending any further. When her fiancé, Philip Winthrop, arrives at the crumbling family estate to claim his bride, Roderick goes to ruthless lengths to keep them apart. And Philip soon discovers that, for the Ushers, their house is more than just a home—it’s their tomb!
tagline: Edgar Allan Poe's demonic tale of The Ungodly... The Evil House of Usher
cast: Vincent Price|Mark Damon|Myrna Fahey|Harry Ellerbe|David Andar
